title: Little Known Black History "Facts" and Relationship Lies
itunes:title: Little Known Black History "Facts" and Relationship Lies
description:
Today is the first day of Black History Month, although we celebrate black history everyday. Harvey and the Crew decided today we will start to share a few little known facts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
